title: A Night at the Opera
body: Greetings Neonate,     Prince pro Tempore Calebros and I humbly invite into our fair city's first Elysium. The date marked for the event shall be June 11th, and the expected attire will be whatever your non-pulsating heart desires. Well, whatever isn't stained or smell of a dirt nap.       The halls of Elysium will be that of Madison Square Garden. Be sure to be there my lovely fresh bloods and see all that our family has to offer.     Je vous envoie mes amicales pens√©es,    Davinia

title: wtf are you kidding me?
body: Are you kidding me? Why don't you change your password?  The system is entirely compromised until you correct it.  You're the sysadmin, if you're this dumb the corporation is at risk.
